gear.name: Sturdy Rod
gear.description: A well-made fishing rod with better balance

gear.name: Lucky Necklace
gear.description: A charm said to bring good fortune to those who wear it while fishing.

gear.name: Leather Gloves
gear.description: Protective gloves for better grip

gear.name: Combat Boots
gear.description: Sturdy boots that improve your footing

gear.name: Fishing Hat
gear.description: A hat that keeps the sun out of your eyes

gear.name: Chain Mail
gear.description: Metal armor that protects your chest

gear.name: Steel Knife
gear.description: A sharp blade for combat and utility

gear.name: Magic Ring
gear.description: An enchanted ring that enhances all abilities

gear.name: Fishing Pants
gear.description: Water-resistant pants for fishing

gear.name: Old Rod
gear.description: A worn-out fishing rod

gear.name: Rusty Knife
gear.description: A dull knife that's seen better days

gear.name: Old Shirt
gear.description: A faded shirt that's seen better days

gear.name: Papa's Rod
gear.description: A legendary fishing rod passed down through generations

gear.name: Fishing Boots
gear.description: Boots designed for fishing, providing comfort and stability

gear.name: Helmet
gear.description: A protective helmet for fishing adventures

gear.name: Spinny Hat
gear.description: A fun hat with a spinning top, bringing joy to fishing

gear.name: Bulletproof Vest
gear.description: Really helps when you get shot in the torso

gear.name: Gloves of Dexterity
gear.description: Gloves that enhance your dexterity and grip

gear.name: Dead Hermit's Ring
gear.description: A ring that belonged to a long-dead hermit, it doesnt seem to do anything special.

gear.name: Dead Hermit's Rod
gear.description: A fishing rod that belonged to the village hermit.

gear.name: Dead Hermit's Tunic
gear.description: A simple tunic worn by the village hermit, it has a calming aura.

gear.name: Hippie Tank Top
gear.description: A tank top you dug up in the cove, it might be the cove hippie's.

gear.name: Mini Skirt
gear.description: A short skirt that allows for freedom of movement while fishing.

gear.name: Gerg's Shoes
gear.description: Shoes that belonged to Gerg, they are quite soggy.
